aiAgentMeta.title: AI Agent PRO - Intelligent Creative Assistant
aiAgentMeta.description: Chat naturally with our AI agent to edit images, generate content, and automate creative workflows. Remove backgrounds, upscale images, generate AI art, and more - all through simple conversation.

hero.subtitle: Chat naturally with our AI to edit images, generate content, and automate creative workflows. No technical skills required.

chat.placeholder: Describe what you want to create or edit...
chat.welcomeSubtitle: I can help you with image editing, generation, and creative tasks. Just describe what you need!

suggestions.title: Try asking me to:
items: Remove the background from my photo
Generate a logo for my business
Upscale this image to 4K quality
Create social media versions of this image
Add a watermark to my images

popular.title: Most Popular
items: Remove the background from my image
Upscale my photo to 4K resolution
Generate a professional logo for my brand
Compress this image for web without losing quality
Create Instagram and Facebook versions of this photo

items: Remove background and add a white backdrop for my product photo
Create product images for Amazon, eBay, and my website
Make this product photo look more professional
Generate lifestyle images showing my product in use
Batch process all my product photos with consistent styling

items: Create a complete social media pack from this image

Fix the lighting and colors in my photo
Remove unwanted objects from my image
Restore this damaged old photograph
Make this blurry photo sharper and clearer

tools.title: Powerful
tools.subtitle: Our agent has access to a comprehensive suite of image editing and generation tools

features.title: Why Choose AI Agent?
features.subtitle: Experience the next generation of creative AI assistance

natural.title: Natural Conversation
natural.description: Just describe what you want in plain English. No complex interfaces or technical knowledge required.

multiTool.title: Multi-Tool Workflows
multiTool.description: Chain multiple operations together. Remove background, upscale, and add watermark - all in one conversation.

context.title: Context Aware
context.description: The agent remembers your conversation and can reference previous images and operations.

realtime.title: Real-time Streaming
realtime.description: See the agent's thinking process and tool executions in real-time as it works on your request.

credits.title: Credit Efficient
credits.description: Only pay for the tools you use. The agent optimizes workflows to minimize credit usage.

history.title: Session History
history.description: Access your previous sessions and continue where you left off. All your work is saved.

items.title: Image Editing
items.description: Remove backgrounds, upscale images, compress files, crop, rotate, add watermarks, and more.

items.title: Image Generation
items.description: Create images from text descriptions, edit existing images with AI, extend images beyond their borders.

items.title: Image Analysis
items.description: Extract text (OCR), detect faces, analyze content, get image metadata and quality assessment.

items.title: Social Media
items.description: Resize images for different platforms, create social media packs with optimized dimensions.

items.title: Batch Processing
items.description: Process multiple images at once with consistent settings. Perfect for bulk operations.

items.title: Smart Workflows
items.description: Combine multiple tools into intelligent workflows. The agent figures out the best approach.

workflows.title: Smart Workflow Examples
workflows.subtitle: See how AI Agent can chain multiple tools together to accomplish complex tasks

items.title: Product Photo Pipeline
items.description: Complete e-commerce image workflow
items.prompt: Take my product photo, remove the background, add a clean white backdrop, upscale to high resolution, and create versions for Amazon, eBay, and my Shopify store

items.title: Social Media Content Pack
items.description: One image, all platforms covered
items.prompt: Create a complete social media pack from this image: Instagram post and story, Facebook cover and post, Twitter header, LinkedIn banner, and generate captions with hashtags for each

items.title: Old Photo Restoration
items.description: Bring vintage photos back to life
items.prompt: Restore this old damaged photo: fix the scratches and tears, enhance the quality, colorize it naturally, and upscale it for printing

items.title: Brand Asset Generator
items.description: From concept to complete brand kit
items.prompt: Generate a modern minimalist logo for my coffee shop called 'Morning Brew', then create variations for dark and light backgrounds, social media profile pictures, and a favicon

useCases.title: Who Uses AI Agent?
useCases.subtitle: Discover how different professionals leverage AI Agent in their daily work

items.title: E-commerce Sellers
items.description: Process product photos in bulk, create consistent listings, and automate image preparation for multiple marketplaces.
items.example: "Process my 50 product photos: remove backgrounds, add shadows, resize for Amazon and eBay"

items.title: Photographers
items.description: Batch edit photos, restore old images, create social media versions, and generate client-ready files quickly.
items.example: "Enhance these wedding photos, create Instagram versions, and add my watermark to all"

items.title: Designers
items.description: Generate design assets, create variations, prepare files for different platforms, and automate repetitive tasks.
items.example: "Generate 5 logo variations in different color schemes and export for print and web"

items.title: Social Media Managers
items.description: Create platform-optimized content, generate captions, resize for all channels, and maintain visual consistency.
items.example: "Create this week's content pack: resize for all platforms, add our branding, generate captions"

items.title: Small Business Owners
items.description: Create professional marketing materials without design skills - logos, social posts, product images, and more.
items.example: "I need a professional logo, business card design, and social media profile images for my bakery"

items.title: Content Creators
items.description: Generate thumbnails, create eye-catching graphics, edit images for blogs, and maintain consistent visual branding.
items.example: "Create a YouTube thumbnail that's attention-grabbing with bold text overlay"

tips.title: Pro Tips for Better Results
tips.subtitle: Get the most out of AI Agent with these expert tips

items.title: Be Specific
items.description: Instead of 'make it better', try 'increase brightness by 20%, add warmth, and sharpen the details'

items.title: Chain Commands
items.description: Combine multiple tasks in one request: 'Remove background, upscale 4x, and save as PNG and WebP'

items.title: Use References
items.description: Describe styles you want: 'Make it look like a professional magazine cover' or 'Apple product photo style'

items.title: Specify Dimensions
items.description: Tell the agent exact sizes: 'Resize to 1920x1080 for my YouTube thumbnail'

items.title: Iterate
items.description: Not perfect? Say 'make it brighter' or 'try a different style' - the agent remembers context

items.title: Batch Wisely
items.description: For multiple images, describe the consistent style once: 'Apply these settings to all my images'

pricing.title: Simple Credit-Based Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Use credits to access AI tools. Different operations have different credit costs based on complexity.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.subtitle: Start chatting with our AI agent and transform your creative workflow.

errors.noCredits: Insufficient credits. Please top up your balance.
